title: VFChain: Enabling Verifiable and Auditable Federated Learning via Blockchain Systems
summaries: in the conventional FL framework, present __[1] a rotating committee selection scheme__ to collectively aggregate models and record verifiable proofs in the blockchain to provide verifiability, and __[2] a novel authenticated data structure__ to improve the search efficiency of verifiable proofs to provide auditability
